services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: Building responsive and scalable full-stack web applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js.

services.title: API Development & Integration
services.description: Designing and building robust RESTful APIs for seamless data communication between client and server.

services.title: Database Design & Management
services.description: Expertise in designing and managing both SQL and NoSQL databases like MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL.

services.title: UI/UX Design & Implementation
services.description: Creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces with a focus on user experience, using tools like Tailwind CSS and ShadCN UI.
